snippet.title: First Class Trouble - Safety Onboard Instructional Film
snippet.description:
Join the St. Patrick's Day Beta March 14 - 18: https://bit.ly/3oRKYfv​ 

The ISS Alithea is the largest and safest cruise ship ever built. The luxurious cabins are built with safety and comfort in mind. But accidents do happen and in case of an emergency, we recommend you follow the five simple steps outlined in the video.

First Class Trouble is a party game where players must work together and against each other to survive a disaster. The goal is to shut down a deadly A.I. of a luxury space cruise ship. Some players are impostors, secretly playing as human-looking killer robots intent on betraying the other players.

NEVER MISS OUT ON NEWS!
SUBSCRIBE: https://bit.ly/2IPMij9​ 
FOLLOW: https://twitter.com/vs_evil​
LIKE: https://www.facebook.com/versusevil​
VERSUS EVIL ON DISCORD: https://discord.gg/versusevil
